student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! How are you feeling today?
I am feeling good, thank you. How are you?
I’m great, thanks! So, do you have any health goals or things you’re working on right now?
Yes, I want to exercise more.
That’s awesome! Start small, like a 10-minute walk every day. It’s easy and helps a lot. What kind of exercise do you like?
Swimming is perfect! It’s great for your whole body and easy on your joints. Try to swim 2-3 times a week if you can. You’ll feel stronger and more energetic! Keep it up!
Thank you! I will try to swim more often.
Good job! You’ve completed the task. Remember, small steps lead to big changes. Talk to you later! 😊
